oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Production of Innovations within Farmer–Researcher Associations Applying Transdisciplinary Research Principles
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Nicolay, Gian L.
Fliessbach, Andreas
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Education, extension and communication
Africa
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Small-scale farmers in sub-Saharan West Africa depend heavily on local resources and local knowledge. Science-based knowledge is likely to aid decision-making in complex situations. In this presentation, we highlight a FiBL-coordinated research partnership between three national producer organisations and national agriculture research bodies in Mali, Burkina Faso, and Benin. The partnership seeks to compare conventional, GMObased, and organic cotton systems as regards food security and climate change.
